dashboard.description:
# Microsoft Teams: Migration This pack looks at a Pilot / Early Adopter scenario where Teams is being brought into an Organization and what to watch out for. It also has Dashboards allowing comparisons between the Pilot users and an existing Skype for Business deployment.
The four dashboards are split into two focusing on the Pilot users and two focusing on a Skype for Business migration scenario.
# Overview **Deployment** * This shows how many Early Adopter devices are running Teams and what percentage of the total systems that is. A threshold is set so that 90% of Early Adopter users should be on Teams enabled devices. Also broken down by location this gives a quick view of Teams deployment across the landscape. * Use the 'Versions Deployed' to know the number of *different* version of Microsoft Teams deployed to Early Adopters and this is broken down by to actual values on the right. Teams should retain to current or current minus one version so follow up any below this.
**Application crashes** * This area shows the overall stability of Teams Early Adopter users. Use the number of crashes, freeze and devices having trouble connecting to see any immediate problems or potential issues if a new version has arrived and it troublesome. * On the right we are giving the top devices with number of crashes to help you determine those devices that are having problems.
**Top users by outgoing traffice & by number of TCP** * This shows your most active users in Teams. Use this figure as a starting point if you want to gain feedback or insight from your most active users in terms of why they find Teams so engaging. Note that these are technical measures of traffic and do not indicate the actual number of messages sent or calls made exactly.
::: configuration * This Dashboard is scoped to Teams users who are defined by the category * Teams User Deployment Ring" and should be set to "Early Adopter" for those users who are part of the Early Adopter waves
Note: This dashboard can be extended for Customers licensed for Nexthink Act. **Please contact Nexthink Professional Services if needed.** :::
dashboard.name: Overview

metric.label: Teams - Deployment - Top 10 Versions Deployed - Early Adopters

dashboard.description:
# Microsoft Teams: Migration This pack looks at a Pilot / Early Adopter scenario where Teams is being brought into an Organization and what to watch out for. It also has Dashboards allowing comparisons between the Pilot users and an existing Skype for Business deployment.
The four dashboards are split into two focusing on the Pilot users and two focusing on a Skype for Business migration scenario.
# Overview
**CPU** * This shows Early Adopter systems that have got high CPU usage by the Teams process which should be investigated, the top systems are listed along with the regional breakdown. Look for this value changing if it coincides with a software version increase. **Memory** * This shows Early Adopter systems that have got high memory for Teams which should be investigated, the top systems are listed along with the regional breakdown. **Network Response Time** * This shows Early Adopter systems that have a high network response time for the Teams process which should be investigated, the top systems are listed along with the regional breakdown. Slow network response times should be investigated as to whether this is a Microsoft issue or an internal cause. **Network Throughput** * Teams uses the network in both directions, in and out. The graph gives an immediate view of the overall traffic going via the Teams process and below the total network throughput on a device by device basis. Any very high values indicate people transferring or receiving a lot of data which could saturate a network link. ::: configuration **This Dashboard is scoped to Teams users who are defined by the category "Teams User Deployment Ring" and should be set to "Early Adopter" for those users who are part of the Early Adopter waves**
Note: This dashboard can be extended for Customers licensed for Nexthink Act. **Please contact Nexthink Professional Services if needed.** :::
dashboard.name: Performance

metric.label: Teams - Performance - Top 10 High Memory Usage - Early Adopters
Teams - Performance - Memory Utilization > 75MB - Early Adopters
Devices with high network response time
Teams - Performance - Top 10 Network Traffic - Early Adopters
Teams - Performance - Network Throughput - Early Adopters

dashboard.description:
# MS Teams: Migration This pack looks at a Pilot / Early Adopter scenario where Teams is being brought into an Organization and what to watch out for. It also has Dashboard allowing comparisons between the Pilot users and an existing Skype for Business deployment.
The four dashboards are split into two focusing on the Pilot users and two focusing on a Skype for Business migration scenario.
# Teams vs Skype: Overview * Use this Dashboard to compare the behaviour of your Early Adopter Teams users with Skype users.
**Teams: Deployment (Early Adopter)** * This shows how many devices are running Teams and what percentage of the total systems that is. * Use the 'Versions Deployed' to know the number of *different* version of Microsoft Teams deployed and this is broken down by to actual values. Teams should retain to current or current minus one version so follow up any below this.
**Teams: Availability (Early Adopter)** * This area shows the overall stability of Teams. Use the number of crashes and freezes to see any immediate problems or potential issues if a new version has arrived and it troublesome.
**Skype: Deployment** * This shows how many devices are running Skype across Production and what percentage of the total systems that is. * Use the 'Versions Deployed' to know the number of *different* versions of Skype are deployed and this is broken down by to actual values beneath.
**Skype: Availability** * This area shows the overall stability of Skype across Production. Use the number of crashes and freezes to compare how Skype is performing against Teams Early Adopters.
::: configuration **No configuration is needed for this dashboard** :::
dashboard.name: Teams vs Skype: Overview

metric.label: Teams - Top 10 versions deployed - Early Adopters
Skype for Business - Top 10 versions deployed

dashboard.description:
MS Teams: Migration
# MS Teams: Migration This pack looks at a Pilot / Early Adopter scenario where Teams is being brought into an Organization and what to watch out for. It also has Dashboard allowing comparisons between the Pilot users and an existing Skype for Business deployment.
The four dashboard's are split into two focusing on the Pilot users and two focusing on a Skype for Business migration scenario.
# Teams vs Skype: Performance * Use this Dashboard to compare the behaviour of your Early Adopter Teams users with Skype users. * You can compare your Pilot Teams users against your Production Skype for Business deployment. The Dashboard is split into four main categories of interest:
**CPU** * See how many systems are suffering from high CPU for the Teams Early Adopter's versus Skype Production Users. Compare also the average CPU values below this.
**Memory** * See how many systems are suffering from high Memory for the Teams Early Adopter's versus Skype Production Users. Compare also the average Memory values below this.
**Network** * See how many systems are suffering from high Network Response Time for the Teams Early Adopter's versus Skype Production Users. Compare also the average Netwoek Response Time values below this.
* There are also the Network Throughput values (split into inbound and outbound traffic) which will enable you to see how much data is being transmitted and received by the Teams Pilot users and compare that to the current volume of Skype for Business users.
::: configuration **No configuration is needed for this dashboard** :::
dashboard.name: Teams vs Skype: Performance

barChartConfig.title: Devices with High Network Response Time
